welcome_message_body: Welcome to Springs, South Africa! Known for its natural beauty and historical charm, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Springs Pizza
restaurants.description: Springs Pizza is a pizzeria located in East Hampton.
restaurants.address: 841 Springs Fireplace Rd (Fort Pond blvd), East Hampton, NY 11937

restaurants.name: Harbor Bistro
restaurants.description: Harbor Bistro is a american restaurant located in East Hampton.
restaurants.address: 313 Three Mile Harbor HC Rd, East Hampton, NY 11937

restaurants.name: Bostwick’s On The Harbor
restaurants.description: Bostwick’s On The Harbor is a seafood restaurant located in East Hampton.

restaurants.name: Si Si
restaurants.description: Si Si is a mediterranean restaurant located in East Hampton.
restaurants.address: 295 Three Mile Harbor HC Rd, East Hampton, NY 11937

restaurants.name: Montauk Marketplace
restaurants.description: Montauk Marketplace is a deli located in East Hampton.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is connected to Terminal A via a walkway.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to international flights and is located on the opposite side of the airport from Terminal A.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 4 hours after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
